transition-colors",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Filter,{className:"h-4 w-4 mr-2 inline"}),"Filter"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"bg-red-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-lg hover:bg-red-700 transition-colors",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AlertTriangle,{className:"h-4 w-4 mr-2 inline"}),"Report Issue"]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-4",children:disputes.map(dispute=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DisputeItem,{dispute:dispute},dispute.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-6 p-4 bg-yellow-50 rounded-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-medium text-yellow-900 mb-2",children:"Dispute Resolution Process"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 text-sm text-yellow-700",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"font-medium",children:"1. Report"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Issue reported by user"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"font-medium",children:"2. Resolution"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Issue resolved and closed"})]})]})]})]})]})]})]});};export default TrustSafety;

sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Shield, Award, FileText, CheckCircle, XCircle, AlertTriangle, Camera, Upload, Download, Eye, Filter, Search, UserCheck, Building, Phone, MessageCircle, Clock, TrendingUp, BarChart3, Settings, Lock, Globe, Heart } from 'lucide-react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; const TrustSafety = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('kyc'); const [selectedStatus, setSelectedStatus] = useState('all'); const [selectedType, setSelectedType] = useState('all'); const [kycData] = useState([ { id: 1, userId: 'WK001', userName: 'Rajesh Kumar', userType: 'worker', documentType: 'Aadhaar Card', documentNumber: 'XXXX-XXXX-1234', status: 'verified', submitted: '2024-01-10', verified: '2024-01-12', verifiedBy: 'Admin User', documentImage: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face' }, { id: 2, userId: 'EMP001', userName: 'ABC Construction', userType: 'employer', documentType: 'Business License', documentNumber: 'BL-2024-001', status: 'pending', submitted: '2024-01-15', verified: null, verifiedBy: null, documentImage: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1541888946425-d81bb19240f5?w=100&h=100&fit=crop' }, { id: 3, userId: 'WK002', userName: 'Suresh Patel', userType: 'worker', documentType: 'PAN Card', documentNumber: 'ABCDE1234F', status: 'rejected', submitted: '2024-01-08', verified: null, verifiedBy: null, documentImage: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face' } ]); const [skillBadges] = useState([ { id: 1, badgeName: 'Safety First', description: 'Completed safety training and certification', icon: 'üõ°Ô∏è', category: 'Safety', requirements: ['Safety Training', 'Equipment Knowledge', 'Test Passed'], issuedCount: 1245, verifiedWorkers: 1180 }, { id: 2, badgeName: 'Skill Master', description: 'Advanced skill level in primary trade', icon: 'üèÜ', category: 'Skills', requirements: ['5+ Years Experience', 'Portfolio Review', 'Reference Check'], issuedCount: 890, verifiedWorkers: 845 }, { id: 3, badgeName: 'Reliability Pro', description: 'Consistent attendance and quality work', icon: '‚≠ê', category: 'Performance', requirements: ['95%+ Attendance', '4.5+ Rating', 'No Complaints'], issuedCount: 567, verifiedWorkers: 523 } ]); const [insuranceData] = useState([ { id: 1, workerId: 'WK001', workerName: 'Rajesh Kumar', policyType: 'Personal Accident', provider: 'LIC Insurance', policyNumber: 'PA-2024-001', coverage: '‚Çπ500,000', premium: '‚Çπ500/month', status: 'active', startDate: '2024-01-01', endDate: '2024-12-31', documents: ['Policy Document', 'Premium Receipt'] }, { id: 2, workerId: 'WK002', workerName: 'Suresh Patel', policyType: 'Health Insurance', provider: 'HDFC Health', policyNumber: 'HI-2024-002', coverage: '‚Çπ300,000', premium: '‚Çπ800/month', status: 'pending', startDate: '2024-02-01', endDate: '2025-01-31', documents: ['Application Form'] } ]); const [disputes] = useState([ { id: 1, disputeId: 'DISP-001', type: 'Payment Dispute', description: 'Worker claims non-payment for completed work', status: 'investigating', priority: 'high', reportedBy: 'Rajesh Kumar', reportedDate: '2024-01-15', assignedTo: 'Support Team', lastUpdated: '2024-01-16' }, { id: 2, disputeId: 'DISP-002', type: 'Work Quality', description: 'Employer dissatisfied with work quality', status: 'resolved', priority: 'medium', reportedBy: 'ABC Construction', reportedDate: '2024-01-10', assignedTo: 'Support Team', lastUpdated: '2024-01-14' } ]); const [stats] = useState({ totalVerifications: 12450, verifiedUsers: 11800, pendingVerifications: 650, rejectedVerifications: 120, activeBadges: 15, totalBadgesIssued: 4560, insuredWorkers: 8900, activeDisputes: 23, resolvedDisputes: 156 }); const TabButton = ({ id, label, icon: Icon, isActive }) => ( ); const StatCard = ({ title, value, icon: Icon, color, subtitle }) => (

{title}

{value}

{subtitle &&

{subtitle}

}
); const KYCItem = ({ item }) => (

{item.userName}

{item.userType} ‚Ä¢ {item.documentType}

Submitted {item.submitted}

{item.status}
); const BadgeCard = ({ badge }) => (
{badge.icon}

{badge.badgeName}

{badge.description}

{badge.category}

{badge.description}

Requirements:

    {badge.requirements.map((req, index) => (
  • {req}
    • ))}
Issued: {badge.issuedCount} Verified: {badge.verifiedWorkers}
); const InsuranceItem = ({ item }) => (

{item.workerName}

{item.policyType} ‚Ä¢ {item.provider}

Policy: {item.policyNumber}

{item.status}

Coverage

{item.coverage}

Premium

{item.premium}

Start Date

{item.startDate}

End Date

{item.endDate}

); const DisputeItem = ({ dispute }) => (

{dispute.disputeId}

{dispute.status} {dispute.priority}

{dispute.description}

Reported by: {dispute.reportedBy} Date: {dispute.reportedDate} Assigned to: {dispute.assignedTo}
); return (
{/* Header */}

Trust & Safety

Platform security and verification management

{/* Quick Stats */}
{/* Navigation Tabs */}
{/* Tab Content */}
{/* KYC Verification Tab */} {activeTab === 'kyc' && (

KYC Verification Queue

{kycData.map(item => ( ))}

KYC Verification Process

1. Document Upload

Users upload identity documents

2. Manual Review

Admin team verifies documents

3. Verification

Status updated and user notified

)} {/* Skill Badges Tab */} {activeTab === 'badges' && (

Skill Badge Management

{skillBadges.map(badge => ( ))}

Badge Benefits

üèÜ Recognition

Showcase skills and achievements

üí∞ Higher Wages

Badge holders earn 15-25% more

üéØ Job Priority

Get selected for premium jobs first

)} {/* Insurance Tab */} {activeTab === 'insurance' && (

Insurance Management

{insuranceData.map(item => ( ))}

Insurance Coverage Types

üõ°Ô∏è Personal Accident

Coverage for work-related injuries

üè• Health Insurance

Medical coverage for workers

üèóÔ∏è Work Equipment

Protection for tools and equipment

)} {/* Dispute Resolution Tab */} {activeTab === 'disputes' && (

Dispute Resolution

{disputes.map(dispute => ( ))}

Dispute Resolution Process

1. Report

Issue reported by user

2. Investigation

Support team investigates

3. Mediation

Parties discuss resolution

4. Resolution

Issue resolved and closed

)}
); }; export default TrustSafety;
